EmailTemplate.subject: Join us at our Executive Testing Leadership Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thursday, Sept. 24th 2015 – Eden au Lac, Zurich
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
We would like to invite you to an exclusive Cognizant and Tricentis Event. Join us on Thursday, Sept. 24th 2015 for the Executive Testing Leadership Roadshow in Zurich.
Adept experts from Cognizant, UBS, Swiss Re and Tricentis will share their insights, best practices, experience and plans for the future on Test Automation.
Agenda:
- Selecting the right tool(s) for test automation (Robert Bonomo, Swiss Country Head of Quality Engineering & Assurance Practice, Cognizant) - Selenium for Webapp testing (Philipp Scherer, AVP, Senior Test Lead, Swiss Re) - Effective Vendor and Customer Collaboration contributing to Testing Initiatives Success (Anna-Maria Blengino, Director, UBS and Chris Cooper, Senior Manager, Cognizant) - How do you achieve the highest sustainable rates of test automation? (Franz Fuchsberger, Founder and CSO, Tricentis) - Conclusion and Business Lunch
Location:
Hotel Eden au Lac Utoquai 45 www.edenaulac.ch
The Executive Testing Leadership Roadshow is an exclusive Cognizant and Tricentis event for executives and senior professionals only. Registration is upon invitation and capacity is limited.
We are looking forward to seeing you soon! Best regards, Your Tricentis Team
